sentences.chinese: 六世元康四年，歙玄孫之子長安上造安漢詔復家。
sentences.literal: Sixth generation Yuankang fourth year, Jin Xi's great-great-grandson's son Chang'an Shangzao Anhan commanded to restore the family.
sentences.idiomatic: In the fourth year of Yuankang of the sixth generation, Jin Xi's great-great-grandson's son, Chang'an Shangzao Anhan, was commanded to restore the family line.

sentences.chinese: 以令史從降沛，為太僕，常奉車，竟定天下，及全皇太子、魯元公主，侯，六千九百戶。
sentences.literal: As clerk followed surrender at Pei, became Grand Coachman, constantly drove the carriage, ultimately pacified the realm, and preserved the Crown Prince and Princess Lu Yuan, made marquis, six thousand nine hundred households.
sentences.idiomatic: As a clerk, he followed the surrender at Pei and became the Grand Coachman. He constantly drove the imperial carriage, ultimately helped pacify the realm, and preserved the Crown Prince and Princess Lu Yuan. He was made a marquis with six thousand nine hundred households.

sentences.chinese: 十二月甲申封，三十年薨。
孝文九年，夷侯灶嗣，七年薨。
十六年，共侯賜嗣，四十一年薨。
元光二年，侯頗嗣，十八年，元鼎二年，坐尚公立與父御婢姦，自殺。
六世元康四年，嬰玄孫之子長安大夫信詔復家。
以中涓從起豐，至霸上，為騎郎將，入漢，以將軍擊項籍，侯，二千二百戶。
